Name: Rodolfo Chung
Sum√°rio:
Being with ZX Ventures since 2017 has been really humbling... Suddenly I found myself having to lead functions like retail, logistics, hospitality and ecommerce that I have never had previous formal experience. I really hope my team can help ABInBev get ahead in the game and really challenge the way business was being done. 

I love traveling, food, booze and people and I‚Äôve done all of this with ABInBev. In the last 18 years I‚Äôve lived and worked in amazing cultures ‚Äì Sao Paulo, Shanghai, Boston and now Melbourne. Z√© Co. is my biggest adventure yet, where as a start-up turning crossing the unicorn milestone, there are new challenges everyday. 

Starting ZX in Australia and now being the first VP of DTC in Brazil allowed me to work closely with the founders of craft breweries and ecommerce start-ups, which is unbelievably inspiring. It is humbling but also rewarding to see some of the ventures graduate to a "growth" stage with 8 digit revenues. 

Away from work, what excites me is trying new restaurants, exploring new countries and cultures and meeting new people. I‚Äôm happy to try anything from fine dining to street food, as long as it‚Äôs authentic. And if it‚Äôs in a hidden alleyway, even better!! so of course, this was the very best part of living in Melbourne and looking forward to rediscover Sao Paulo post pandemic... .:)
